defaultMessage: This created Event is unconfirmed. You cannot interact with it until it is confirmed by the blockchain.
Setting the result requires staking the Consensus Threshold amount.
When a result's total votes reaches the Consensus Threshold, it will become the new result.
Finalizing the result can be done by anyone. It will finish this voting round and set the final result as the last round's result. Winners can withdraw their winnings once an Event is finalized.
You have a pending transaction for this event. Please wait until it's confirmed before doing another transaction.
The betting start time has not started yet.
The result setting start time has not started yet.
You are not the result setter for this Event. You must wait until they set the result, or until the Open Result Set start time begins.
Please click and select one of the options.
